compliant.section: We review background checks (including criminal records as legally required or permitted) for drivers and delivery partners to verify their identity and eligibility to provide transportation or delivery services.
compliant.legal provisions: Right to access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability, and objection.  Processing of personal data for employment purposes.

compliant.section: In the US, we may use name, date of birth, email address, phone number, payment information, and third-party wallets to verify the identity of riders and order recipients to help prevent fraudulent account use of our services.
